description.value:
Trigger The characters' shared vision during Event 15 subsides

Effect The memory of Osoyo unleashes a tremendous sigh of freezing wind, coating the deck of the Mermaid's Tears in ice in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60]. (The hazard can choose any point for the cone to originate.) The area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save or take [[/r 1d6[persistent,cold]]] as the freezing wind cuts to the bone. The hazard then rolls initiative.

details.description: The party's memories of Osoyo coalesce into a titanic mirage in the storm clouds above.
details.disable: @Check[type:occultism|dc:22] (trained) or @Check[type:arcana|dc:24] (trained) to divert the memory's rage; three total successful checks are required to disable the hazard
details.routine: (1 action) The memory of Osoyo gives a keening scream that shatters the layer of ice coating the deck of the Mermaid's Tears. Any creature on difficult terrain created by the memory's Glacial Gust takes [[/r (2d8+7)[cold]]] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true]) from the icy shrapnel.
